name: Validate e-mail addresses and phone numbers by Loqate and create new customers in Shopify for new Google Sheets rows
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the email address and phone nubmer by Loqate and create new customer in Shopify. The example uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1t_QPI-4JMX21JCydPvSqjSnzR9HLNgZ1I-birJvmfnU/edit?usp=sharing).
